tests.name: Game Controller GET /games should get no games when no populate yet.
Game Controller GET /games should get 3 games when 3 games were created.
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when there is not enough players [#0].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when there is not enough players [#1].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when the maximum of players is reached [#2].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when one of the player name is too short [#3].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when one of the player name is too long [#4].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when two players have the same name [#5].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when werewolf is in excluded roles [#6].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when villager is in excluded roles [#7].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should not allow getting random game composition when there is twice the same excluded role [#8].
Game Controller GET /games/random-composition should get random composition when called.
Game Controller GET /game/:id should get a bad request error when id is not mongoId.
Game Controller GET /game/:id should get a not found error when id doesn't exist in base.
Game Controller GET /game/:id should get a game when id exists in base.
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when no players are provided [#0].
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when the minimum of players is not reached [#1].
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when the maximum of players is reached [#2].
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when one of the player name is too short [#3].
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when one of the player name is too long [#4].
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when two players have the same name [#5].
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when there is only one brother in the same game [#6].
Game Controller POST /games should not allow game creation when there is two witches in the same game [#7].
